message.body: Hi guy (sorry if the chat is private, found the link on the other one, tell me and i'll delete this one of my list ;) ) just looked at the github, does the solution for the signing error works?
'cause a guy of french community found out that by deleting the file from /data/id of site/data/users/ with the user identity adress it works again
we both had the error and we both solved it this way
